description: The leader of Lebanon's Hezbollah said fighting with Israel would 'not be limited' to the scale seen until now
maintext: With the conflict nearing the end of its fourth week, US Secretary of State Antony Blinken met with Netanyahu. He urged Israel to ensure more humanitarian aid and do more to protect Palestinian civilians in Gaza or else there will be "no partners for peace".
title: Israel's military 'on very high alert' along Lebanon border as Hezbollah leader gives speech
